alert.note: Alert for Guadalupe Mountains Above 7000 Feet; Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 10 at 2:55AM CST until January 12 at 8:00AM CST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON CST /11 AM MST/ TODAY TO 8 AM CST /7 AM MST/ FRIDAY... * WHAT...West winds 40 to 60 mph with gusts up to 95 mph expected. * WHERE...Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains. * WHEN...From noon CST /11 AM MST/ today to 8 AM CST /7 AM MST/ Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Severe turbulence near the mountains will be hazardous for low flying light aircraft.
info.instruction: Take action to secure trash cans, lawn furniture and other loose or lightweight outdoor objects. The high winds can topple trees, down power lines and damage some structures. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Guadalupe Mountains Above 7000 Feet; Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains
